channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billionaire Sir Richard Branson plans to take on Eurostar’s 30-year train monopoly with $900 million Virgin Group fundraise
item.description: Branson's Virgin Group confirmed a mammoth fundraising plan that could see Virgin operate a Eurostar alternative by the end of the decade.

item.title: Zelensky Is Set to Meet With Saudi Crown Prince Before U.S.-Ukraine Talks
item.description: The Ukrainian president is trying to secure a favorable deal to end his country’s war with Russia. Saudi Arabia has emerged as a host to talks that th...

item.title: South Korea's Martial Law: How the President's Plan Came Together and Fell Apart
item.description: Yoon Suk Yeol came close to disabling Parliament with a few hundred troops. But he misjudged the power of his people and the willingness of his army t...

item.title: Oil Tanker and Container Ship Collide in the North Sea
item.description: Britain’s coast guard said it was “coordinating the emergency response to reports of a collision between a tanker and cargo vessel,” and that a fire h...

item.title: U.S. tariffs threaten to put European delicacies, from Champagne to Parmigiano, out of Americans’ reach, conjuring a 1960s throwback
item.description: “There is a whole public of people in the U.S. that seems to need the culture of Europe,” a French Champagne maker said.

item.title: Curtis Sittenfeld Goes Home Again
item.description: The best-selling bard of female anxiety rakes over some middle school memories while visiting the city where she grew up.

item.title: ‘Trumpcession’ fears spike after Trump refuses to promise economic growth will continue
item.description: Asked about the threat of a recession this year, President Trump warned there would be a “period of transition” as he renegotiates trade relationships...

item.title: Think You Understand Your Dog? Think Again.
item.description: People interpret a dog’s emotions based on its situation and have “a big blind spot” for the actual animal, a new study found.

item.title: Russian Forces Depleted and Stalling on Eastern Front, Ukraine Says

item.title: These are the AI tools that HR teams are finding most useful, according to a new report
item.description: In a year of practical AI experimentation, a new report sheds light on some of the most effective use cases.

item.title: These are the U.S. states where women are the most—and least—likely to wield power
item.description: Future Forward Women measured women's wellbeing and power state by state.

item.title: For Patients Needing Transplants, Hope Arrives on Tiny Hooves
